document_name: National strategy in the field of climate change by 2030
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MNE/2015/MNE-2015-12-25-National strategy in the field of climate change by 2030_16c078a2da326d14fa348ffb730ca6f0.pdf
document_description: This strategy aims at assessing the institutional framework in place and the technological needs that Montenegro must build for mitigation and adaptation purposes. It analyses the following documents and implications for climate change: Energy Development Strategy of Montenegro until 2030, the National strategies for renewable energy and energy efficiency, the National Forest Strategy (which recognises climate change as an important factor affecting national forest protection measures), National Sustainable Development Strategy, and Strategy for the Development of Agriculture and Rural Areas 2014-2020. The document further discusses state aid and market instruments, mitigation potentials, and makes policy and legal recommendations.
